reviews.review_msg: Loved this prof, it was kind of a teach it to yourself type of class but she always came to class excited to teach. She was also time efficient and LOVED her guest lecturer. Easy science credit.

I know it's not Ruth's fault but holy, assignments not marked throughout the entire semester until day before the 
 final. And now still waiting for final grade for 2 weeks. Hard to navigate the class when you don't have your grades the entire time. the final was insane I don't know where that material even came from.

this course was strange. The exams didn't make any sense and were extremely hard. otherwise this course was very easy with little homework? 50% of your grade is on tutorials/quizzes. nothing was marked until the very last minute. exams didn't reflect what was taught in an extreme way but you'll be fine if you do all the homework. so weird
